sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const InputBox = () => { const [status, setStatus] = useState(false); const statusHandler = () => { if (!status) setStatus(true); else setStatus(false); }; const initialValues = { ProductName: "", Quantity: "", Price: "", Amount: "", Created: "", Updated: "", } return ( <> {status && (

Product Name:

Quantity:

Price: $

Amount: $

Created:

Updated:

Due Date:

Bill No:

Gross Amount: $

GST Amount: $

Net Amount: $

Status:

Note:

)} ); }; export default InputBox;
